name: Reptyro

aura.name: ore-loving_beast
aura.description: Can be ridden. Improves efficiency of mining ores while mounted.

description: Magma-like blood runs throughout its body. If a large amount of water is thrown on it, this water rapidly heats, causing an immense vapor explosion.

skills.name: ignis_blast
skills.description: Hurls a ball of fire straight at an enemy.

skills.name: stone_blast
skills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

skills.name: stone_cannon
skills.description: Digs up a boulder and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: ignis_breath
skills.description: Shoots flames at an enemy, dealing continuous damage.

skills.name: volcanic_burst
skills.description: Reptyro's exclusive skill. Raises its front legs before slamming them into the ground, causing volcanic eruptions under its enemies. It simultaneously bombards them with volcanic bombs from above.

skills.name: ignis_rage
skills.description: Energizes the surrounding ground, causing it to explode after a set amount of time.

skills.name: rock_lance
skills.description: Generates a sharp rock spear under an enemy.
